election_record.label: Massachusetts 1820 State Senate, Worcester County

overview.note: "Whole number of votes, 8949. Necessary to make a choice, 4475." Governor's Council Records.

sub_unit.name: Brookfield
sub_unit.note: Salem Town, Jr. received 1 vote as Salem Towne.

sub_unit.name: Petersham
sub_unit.note: James Estabrook received 111 votes as Joseph Estabrook.

sub_unit.name: Westminster
sub_unit.note: Stephen P. Gardner received 1 vote as Stephen Gardner.

election_record.reference: Governor's Council Records. Massachusetts State Archives, Boston.
